text: Minister of Foreign Affairs of Sri Lanka Mangala Samaraweera met his Maldivian counterpart Dr. Mohamed Asim yesterday (9th Feb.) at the Foreign Affairs Ministry in Maldives. Minister Samaraweera is on a two-day official visit to Maldives to participate the third session of the Joint Commission between Maldives and Sri Lanka.
title: Foreign Minister meets his Maldivian Counterpart
